about.title: About
about.p1: I'm a Full-stack Developer focused on developing Websites and Web Applications that help clients succeed in their ventures. Check out some of the applications in the Projects section! See
about.p2: I also share my professional life with the community, so feel free to follow me on LinkedIn, where I post updates about my studies and professional career. I'm also available to answer any questions through the contact channels. See
about.p3: I'm open to job opportunities where I can contribute and learn. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experiences, then don't hesitate to contact me.
about.p4: Here you can see more about my previous experiences:
about.p5: I have experience with various technologies and I am always updating myself and learning new things to help provide the best possible solution for the problems that arise. Check out the technologies I have been working with on

linkedin.p-1: I am a full-stack developer with experience in TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Next.js, and Node.js. I am passionate about building scalable, intuitive, and high-performance web applications, always striving to adopt best practices and explore new technologies. Beyond development, I have a strong interest in software architecture, performance optimization, and cloud service integration.
linkedin.p-2: On my LinkedIn, I share knowledge, experiences, and insights from my professional journey. I am always open to new connections, collaborations, and opportunities to grow in the field. If you'd like to discuss technology or development, feel free to send me a message!

github.p-1: On my GitHub, you will find projects I have developed using TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Next.js, and Node.js. I enjoy building modern web applications, exploring best development practices, clean architecture, and performance optimization. Additionally, I am always looking to learn new technologies and improve my skills through practical challenges.
github.p-2: I also share repositories with solutions for everyday problems, experiments with libraries and frameworks, as well as contributions to the community. If youâ€™d like to check out my code, give feedback, or collaborate on a project, feel free to explore my repositories!
